sentence.text: negative regulation of axon extension-A and Nogo-C are potent Nogos that are predominantly expressed in the central nervous system.

In recent years, it has been demonstrated that dolichyl diphosphate biosynthetic process plays an important role in human pathophysiological processes, including lipid metabolism, angiogenesis, N-glycosylation, cell apoptosis, chemoresistance in human hepatocellular carcinoma, and epithelial-mesenchymal transition.
